title: PanicleNeRF: low-cost, high-precision in-field phenotypingof rice panicles with smartphone
abstract: arXiv:2408.02053v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: The rice panicle traits significantly influence grain yield, making them a primary target for rice phenotyping studies. However, most existing techniques are limited to controlled indoor environments and difficult to capture the rice panicle traits under natural growth conditions. Here, we developed PanicleNeRF, a novel method that enables high-precision and low-cost reconstruction of rice panicle three-dimensional (3D) models in the field using smartphone. The proposed method combined the large model Segment Anything Model (SAM) and the small model You Only Look Once version 8 (YOLOv8) to achieve high-precision segmentation of rice panicle images. The NeRF technique was then employed for 3D reconstruction using the images with 2D segmentation. Finally, the resulting point clouds are processed to successfully extract panicle traits. tldr: 该文章提出了一种名为PanicleNeRF的低成本、高精度水稻穗状花序田间表型测量方法，使用智能手机拍摄的照片即可实现。该方法结合了大型模型Segment Anything Model（SAM）和小型模型You Only Look Once version 8（YOLOv8）对水稻穗状花序图像进行高精度分割，并用NeRF技术进行3D重建，最终处理点云数据提取穗状花序特征。实验结果表明，PanicleNeRF有效地解决了2D图像分割问题，并且实现了预测准确率与测试准确率的吻合，验证了该方法的有效性。
